radiographic_examinations.findings: Small right pleural effusion with associated subsegmental atelectasis; no suspicious liver lesions; mild diffuse fatty infiltration of liver; common bile duct measures 9 mm with a plastic stent present; no strictures in the common bile duct; small quantity of layering sludge in the common bile duct; moderate stricture of the common hepatic duct; gallbladder distended with sludge; mild thickening of gallbladder wall; atrophic pancreas; few cortical cysts within both kidneys; wall thickening of duodenum related to secondary inflammatory changes.
